297b7('dul ba): skyes te/ ngu bzhin pa ni nan gyis bzung ba zhes bya/ bos bgrogs nas bdag la ma 'dzin cig ces smra ba ni nan gyis bzung ba zhes bya ste/ nan gyis bzung ba la nyes pa med do// dge slong ma pho brang skyong zhes bya ba zhig mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms spyod pa na g.yon
298a1('dul ba): can rnams kyis bzung ste nags stug por khrid nas sun phyung ste btang ba la de dge slong ma dag gis gnas nas bskrad pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag gis dga' bar ni ma tshor ro// 'o na kun dga' bo'i drung du song shig ces smras nas/
298a2('dul ba): de de'i drung du song ba dang / gnas brtan gyis kyang mthong nas des gus pa'i tshig tu ma smras pa dang / gnas brtan gyis kyang bskrad nas de 'di snyam du bdag 'di 'dra bar 'tsho zhing 'dug pa bas song la bum pa bye mas bkang ba mgul du btags te klung a dzi ra ba ti ra
298a3('dul ba): mchong ngo snyam du bsams nas/ des bum pa bye mas bkang ba mgul du btags te klung a dzi ra ba ti ra mchongs pa dang / tha gu ngan pa zhig pas chad de bying zhing nub pa g.yon can rnams kyis mthong nas/ de dag gis phyung ste bzhag nas nam 'du shes slar rnyed pa
298a4('dul ba): dang / de la sun 'byin to// dge slong ma dag kyang tshol zhing gnas der lhags pa dang / de dag gis de la sun 'byin par mthong nas/ des smras pa/ 'di sngon ni dge slong ma yin na da dung yang dge slong ma yin nam zhes smras nas/ de ltar gyur pa
298a5('dul ba): dge slong rnams la smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci khyod kyis dga' bar tshor ram/ btsun pa 'gres ldogs sug pa g.yabs bdag la ma 'dzin cig ces smras na dga' ba lta ga la tshor/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
298a6('dul ba): dge slong dag bud med kyi mo mtshan gyi phyogs ni las rnam par smin pa las skyes te 'gre ba ni nan gyis bzung ba zhes bya ba nas/ bdag la ma 'dzin cig ces smra ba ni nan gyis bzung ba zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par te/ nan gyis bzung ba la ni nyes pa med do// //
298a7('dul ba): mdor na/ nor can dgon pa 'du shes dang // bsod snyoms bcu dang rkun po bcu// gzhan yang sho gam gnas kyi bcu// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs so// sngon gyi rdza pa dge slong nor can bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas pas
298b1('dul ba): las dang po pa la ni nyes pa med de/ bdag gis ni shing mang zhig ma byin par blangs te 'ongs na gang la bdag las dang po par 'gyur zhes sems la gdung zhing 'gyod de 'gyod par gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bslab
298b2('dul ba): pa'i gnas ma bcas pas sngon gyi rdza pa dge slong nor can ni kun las kyang 'das te thams cad du las dang po pa yin pas las dang po pa la ni nyes pa med do/ / dge slong zhig dgon pa bdag po med pa'i yo byad la bdag po yod par 'du shes nas ma byin par blangs
298b3('dul ba): pa dang / dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag po yod pa la bdag po yod par 'du shes na phas pham par 'gyur ro// bdag po yod pa la the tshom du gyur na phas pham par 'gyur ro// bdag po med pa la bdag
298b4('dul ba): po yod par 'du shes na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ / bdag po med pa la bdag po med par 'du shes na nyes pa med do// dge slong gis bsod snyoms 'bras can zhig mi dbang bar blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phas pham pa'i
298b5('dul ba): nyes pa med de/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// bsod snyoms 'bras can la ji lta ba bzhin du bsod snyoms phye dang / phya tshal btsos pa'i bsod snyoms dang / bsod snyoms sha dang / bsod snyoms bag chos rnams thams cad kyang de bzhin du nyes pa sbom por
298b6('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ / dge slong zhig mgron du ma bos par zan zos pa dang / dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro// ljongs ko sa lar dge 'dun gyi bshos 'god pa na
298b7('dul ba): dge slong gzhi ba zhig grong gzhan du song ba dang / de dang lhan cig spyod pa gnyis shig yod de/ de gnyis kas mkhan po'i zan so sor mnos pa dang / de gnyis 'di snyam du khyod kyis kyang mnos/ kho bos kyang mnos na/ gang gang gis mi dbang bar blangs
299a1('dul ba): mi shes te phas pham pa'i nyes par ma gyur grang snyam du bsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blangs pa la nyes pa med de/ gzhan zhes bya bar byos shig ljongs ko sa lar dge 'dun gyi bshos 'god pa na dge slong gzhi
299a2('dul ba): ba zhig grong gzhan du song nas dge slong de'i mdza' bo des de'i zan mnos pa dang / de 'ongs nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis kho bo'i zan mnos sam smras pa/ mnos so// dge slong des ngas ma bcol bar khyod kyis ci'i phyir mnos zhes smras pa dang / dge slong de
299a3('dul ba): 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes pa med de/ ma bcol par ni ma nod cig/ ljongs ko sa lar dge 'dun gyi bshos 'god pa na dge slong nad pa zhig yod de de'i nad g.yog gis zan mnos te/ des mnos nas song ba dang / dge slong
299a4('dul ba): de yang dus las 'das nas des ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste sngar dus las 'das la phyis mnos na ni de nyid du slar phul cig/ 'on te sngar mnos la phyis dus las 'das na yo byad gzhan ji lta ba de ltar byos shig/
299a5('dul ba): dge slong zhig gis dge slong zhig la 'di skad du tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog/ rkun po la 'dong ngo zhes smras nas de gnyis dong ste lam gyi phyed du phyin pa dang / bdag cag ni dge bar gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung bas rkun po byas na ni bdag cag gnyis mi mdzes
299a6('dul ba): shing mi rigs so snyam ste ngo tsha ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur nas de gnyis der ma dong ba dang / de gnyis 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de nyes byas su 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig gis dge slong dag gcig la tshe dang ldan
299a7('dul ba): pa dag tshur shog/ rkun po la 'dong ngo zhes de skad smras pa dang / de dag dong nas lam gyi phyed du phyin pa dang / bdag cag ni mi mdzes so snyam nas ngo tsha ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur te de der ma dong ba dang / dge slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phas
299b1('dul ba): pham pa'i nyes pa med de/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro// de dag bzhin du byas pa las gcig ni ngo tsha ba'i chos dang ldan nas de 'di snyam du de ste ma song na ni de dag gis bdag 'tsho ba dang phral bar 'gyur gyis bdag song la bdag gis ma byin par mi blang zhing bdag gi skal ba mi
299b2('dul ba): bkur ro snyam du bsams nas des der ma byin par yang ma blangs skal ba yang ma khyer ba dang / dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de nyes byas su 'gyur ro// dge slong dag gis dge slong dag la tshe dang ldan
299b3('dul ba): pa dag tshur shog rkun po la 'dong ngo zhes smras nas de dag der dong ba dang / de dag las phyed ni las byed phyed ni lam srung ngo // de dag las lam srung ba gang yin pa de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag gis ni ma blangs shing ma brkus pas nyes par mi 'gyur ro snyam du bsams pa dang / de
299b4('dul ba): ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste dngos po tshang na phas pham par 'gyur ro// dngos po ma tshang na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig gis dge slong zhig la tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog rkun po
299b5('dul ba): la 'dong ngo zhes smras nas de dag gis ma byin par blangs pa dang gzhan du ni dngos po ma tshang gi de gnyis kyis gang nas blangs pa de nyid du dngos po tshang nas dge slong de gnyis 'gyod pa skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas gang nas bskyod pa de'i rin thang
299b6('dul ba): brtsi bar bya'o/ / dge slong zhig gis dge slong dag cig la tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur shog rkun po la 'dong ngo // gang gis ci thob pa de de nyid dbang ngo zhes smras nas de dag der dong ba dang / de dag las kha cig gis ni thob/ kha cig gis ma thob/ de dag 'gyod pa skyes pa dang /
299b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong de dag la rkun pos kyang byin thun mong ba dang srung ba dag gis kyang byin na de dag 'gyod pa skyes nas ma blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rjes su
300a1('dul ba): gnang ba ni sbyin par byed pa la sbyin bdag tu sems nye bar zhog ste long shig/ dge slong zhig gi lhan cig spyod pa de rkun pos khrid pa dang / de de nas bros te 'ongs nas dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
300a2('dul ba): slong bdag nyid kyis bdag brku bar rung gis nyes pa med do/ / dge slong zhig la sho gam gcad pa'i rdzas shig lag na yod na de ste sho gam gyi gnas las 'das na ni phas pham par 'gyur ro// des 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi ma'i'o// 'di ni bdag gi pha'i'o// 'di ni bdag gi
300a3('dul ba): bu'i'o/ / 'di ni bdag gi sring mo dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / mchod rten dang / dge 'dun rnams kyi'o snyam du bsams nas mang po la bsngos te 'das na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// nam mkha' las 'das na ni nyes pa med do// // mdor na/ khri'u dang glegs
300a4('dul ba): bam seng ras dang / / chang dang sha dang gos dang nang // phyag dar khrod dang dur khrod dang // dur khrod kyi ni gnas gnyis so// dge slong zhig gis khri'u zhig brnyas nas khyer te 'ongs nas des slar mi sbyin no snyam bsams pa dang / dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das
300a5('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig gis glegs bam zhig brnyas nas khyer te 'ongs pa dang de yang rgyas par de bzhin no// dge slong zhig gis seng ras shig ma byin par blangs te des de brkus nas bshig pa dang / de'i nang
300a6('dul ba): nas dar rin thang chen po zhig byung ste dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ seng ras kyi rin thang brtsi bar bya'o// rkun po dag cig gis chang zhig khyer te dgon pa la dong nas chang kha cig ni 'thungs/ kha cig ni sbas te dong ba dang / dge slong dag kyang
300a7('dul ba): gnas der nyin par spyod pa'i phyir dong ba dang / de dag gis de mthong nas de dag gis tshwar 'gyur gyis song la gtsug lag khang du skyol cig ces smras nas de gtsug lag khang du bskyal to// rkun po dag kyang skom nas der song ste btsal ba dang ma rnyed nas de dag gis dge slong de dag mthong ste
300b1('dul ba): de dag la btsun pa kye khyed kyis chang zhig ma bsnams sam zhes dris pa dang / dge slong dag gis khyer ro zhes smras pa dang / rkun pos btsun pa kho bo cag gi chang brkus pas na khyod ni rkun ma'o zhes smras pa dang / dge slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
300b2('dul ba): nyes pa med de/ bdag po yod dam med shin tu brtags la blang bar bya'o// de ltar sha'ang de bzhin no// rkun pos grong bcom nas ra mda' bas bsnyags pa dang / gtsug lag khang du phyin te de dag skrag pas gtsug lag khang du song nas gos kyang dge slong dag la phul nas dgon
300b3('dul ba): pa la bros pa dang / khyim bdag de dag gis gtsug lag khang de bskor nas de gtsug lag khang du dong ba dang / de dag gis dge slong dag gi lag pa na gos de dag 'dug par mthong nas de dag gis gos 'di ni bdag gi'o zhes smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis kho bo cag la ni rkun
300b4('dul ba): pos byin no zhes smras pa dang / dge slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes pa med de/ rkun pos brkus nas brtan pa'i nor ma len cig/ 'on te rkun po rgyal mtshan can zhig gis byin na ni de las blang bar byos la gos gris dros la kha dog
300b5('dul ba): sgyur te chongs shig/ de kha dog bsgyur kyang slar slong na de yang byin cig/ btso blag mkhan zhig gis gos thal chu'i nang du bcug pa dang / des brjed de grong du song ngo // des yang gos dran par gyur nas de slar log ste song ba dang dge slong zhig kyang phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol zhing
300b6('dul ba): gnas der phyin nas des gos de mthong ste/ dge slong des gos de blangs nas song ba dang / btso blag mkhan des mthong nas btsun pa gos ma rku zhes smras pa dang / dge slong gis kho bo phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol ba las 'di mthong na khyod la 'di cir dgos zhes smras pa dang /
300b7('dul ba): btso blag mkhan gyis btsun pa kho bos gos 'di thal skyor bcug pa las brjed de 'di ni bdag gi gos lags kyis ma rku shig/ khyod kyis ni ma byin par blangs so zhes smras pa dang / dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes pa
301a1('dul ba): med de/ bdag po gzhan yod dam med shin tu brtags la blang bar bya'o// btso blag mkhan gyis gos bkrus te shing drung du 'dug pa dang / phyag dar khrod pa zhig phyag dar khrod pa'i gos tshol zhing gnas der phyin te des gos de mthong nas
301a2('dul ba): gos blangs te song ba dang / btso blag mkhan de mthong nas btsun pa 'di ni bdag gi gos lags kyis ma rku shig ces smras pa dang / de ste khyod kyi yin na slar khyer cig/ dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shin tu brtags par
301a3('dul ba): bya ba rgyas par ro/ / khyim bdag cig gis gos bzhag ste bshang ba byed pa dang / phyag dar khrod pa zhig phyag dar khrod pa'i gos tshol zhing gnas der phyin pa des gos de mthong nas des khyer te song ba dang / khyim bdag de langs te btsun pa 'di ni bdag gi bgo ba lags kyis
301a4('dul ba): ma rku shig ces smras pa dang / de ste khyod kyi yin na slar khyer cig/ dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes pa med de/ shin tu rtogs la khyer cig/ dze ta'i tshal nas shin tu mi ring ba zhig na zhing rmod pa'i las byed pa zhig gos rnams bzhag ste
301a5('dul ba): zhing rmod pa dang / dge slong phyag dar khrod pa zhig phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol zhing gnas der phyin te des gos de mthong nas des gos de khyer te song ba dang / zhing rmod pa'i las byed pa des mthong nas/ btsun pa gos ma rku shig ces smras pa dang / des de la ma mnyan pa dang / des kyang brgyugs
301a6('dul ba): te bzung nas btsun pa rigs sam gos de ma byin par ma blang shig/ 'di ni kho bo phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol ba na mthong ste/ khyod la 'di cir dgos/ btsun pa gos 'di bzhag nas bdag zhing rmod rmod de gos 'di ni bdag gi'o zhes smras nas/ de ste khyod kyi na slar khyer cig/ dge slong de
301a7('dul ba): 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes pa med de/ shin tu rtogs pa gyis te long shig/ khyim bdag zhig gis dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams ni lhung ba'i gos de rnams phyag dar khrod kyi gos so zhes nas khyer ro zhes thos pa dang / des ras rin che ba zhig la kAR+ShA
301b1('dul ba): pa Na brgyad phur pa phur te phyag dar spungs pa'i khrod du brkos nas sbas te kha tshar tsam zhig snang bar byas te song ba dang / dge slong zhig phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol zhing gnas der phyin te des kha tshar mthong nas des de nas drangs te khyer ba dang / khyim bdag des mthong nas/
301b2('dul ba): btsun pa ras ma rku shig ces smras pa dang / dge slong gis ngas 'di ni phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol ba las rnyed na de khyed la cir dgos zhes smras pa dang / btsun pa bdag gis ni dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams kyis lhung ba'i gos gang rnyed pa de phyag dar khrod pa'o zhes te khyer ro//
301b3('dul ba): zhes thos nas bdag gis ras la kAR+ShA pa Na brgyad phur pas phur te phyag dar spungs par sbas pas so// dge slong des kAr+ShA pa Na brgyad po de mthong nas/ de ste khyod kyi yin na khyer cig ces smras nas/ dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
301b4('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ nyes pa med de/ shin tu brtags la bkur bar bya'o// khyim bdag gi khye'u zhig gis srang du gos bzhag ste rtsed mo rtse'o// de rtses nas khyim du song ba dang / dge slong zhig phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol zhing gnas der 'ongs pa dang
301b5('dul ba): des gos de mthong nas des de blangs te song ba dang / bud med cig kyang khyim de nas byung ste/ des kyang dge slong de mthong nas btsun pa gos ma rku shig ces smras pa dang / 'di ni kho bos phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol na rnyed do// btsun pa kho mo'i khye'u rtse ba na gos
301b6('dul ba): brjed de khyim du mchis so/ / zhes smras pa dang / de ste khyod kyi yin na khyer cig/ dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes pa med de/ shin tu brtags la blang bar byos shig/ dge slong zhig gis phyag dar khrod pa'i gos
301b7('dul ba): sbas te mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / dge slong gzhan zhig kyang phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol zhing gnas der phyin nas/ des de mthong ste bkrus pa dang / dge slong des kyang phyag dar khrod kyi gos btsal na ma rnyed nas des dge slong de 'khru ba mthong
302a1('dul ba): nas/ des tshe dang ldan pa khyod la ni phas pham pa'i nyes pa byung ngo // zhes smras pa dang / ci'i phyir/ kho bo'i phyag dar khrod kyi gos 'di ma byin par blangs pa'i phyir ro// 'di la ni bdag po yod par kho bos ma shes so//
302a2('dul ba): zhes smras pa dang / dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes pa med de/ shin tu brtags la blang bar gyis shig/ dge slong de dag gis mi gtsang bas reg pa'i phyag dar khrod kyi gos bcangs pa dang / lha phran rnams 'phya
302a3('dul ba): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyag dar khrod kyi gos ni bkrus te legs par btsems la bcang bar bya bas na dge slong dge slong dag gis mi gtsang bas reg pa'i phyag dar khrod kyi gos ma 'chang shig/ 'chang ba gang yin pa de ni nyes byas su 'gyur ro//
302a4('dul ba): dge slong de dag gis bdag po yod pa'i dur khrod nas gos blangs pa dang / rigs ngan rnams kyis gang cung zad bdag cag gis las su byas pa thams cad 'di dag gi phyir byed na 'di nas gos ma rku shig ces de skad mi snyan par smra ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
302a5('dul ba): stsal pa/ bdag po dang bcas pa'i dur khrod nas gos ma len cig/ blangs na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dur khrod nas shin tu mi ring ba zhig na log pa'i lha khang zhig yod de/ de nas ras zhig rlung gis khyer nas dur khrod du lhung ba dang dge slong zhig phyag dar khrod kyi
302a6('dul ba): gos tshol zhing dur khrod du 'ongs pa des ras de rnyed nas de blangs te khyer ba dang / log pa'i lha khang na gnas pa de dag gis mthong nas/ btsun pa bdag cag gis ras 'di log pa'i lha khang nas dur khrod du lhung ba yin gyis ras 'di ma rku shig ces smras pa dang / de ste
302a7('dul ba): khyod kyi yin na slar khyer cig/ dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes pa med de/ bdag po gzhan yod dam med pa shin tu rtogs la long shig// /
